creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: large blouse or dress; white with purple stripes; round neckline with maroon edging, maroon U-shaped insets with purple, orange and green embroidery, embroidered "tassel" trim and six embroidered triangles
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
